title: Jonathan Groff And Raúl Castillo: Looking For Answers (R)
description: Actors Jonathan Groff and Raúl Castillo play a will-they-or-won't-they couple in HBO's Looking and recreate their onscreen chemistry in a game about famous TV on-again, off-again romances.
